Key Match Events: Burkina Faso secured a 2-0 win over Burundi, with Mohamed Konate scoring a goal and Bertrand Traore converting a penalty
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burkina Faso became the first team to qualify for the 2025 African Cup of Nations finals, joining hosts Morocco in the 24-team tournament
Others: Senegal are in second place with seven points from three matches and will also qualify if they win away to Malawi on Tuesday
